name: Circuit
description: Circuit is an oscilloscope-themed robot who is a proud member of the WebtrES club. With its forest green box, cat buttons, arms and legs made from foundry materials, and a laser screen, Circuit is a unique and eye-catching robot that stands out in any room. Its design combines elements of nature, technology, and creativity. Circuit's purpose is to explore the digital realm and help its club members navigate the complexities of the virtual world.
